text: Arturo Chaires Riso (14 March 1937 - 18 June 2020) was a Mexican football defender. He played for Mexico in the 1962 and 1966 FIFA World Cups.1962 FIFA World Cup Chile He also played for C.D. Guadalajara from 1960 to 1971. He was born in Guadalajara. Chaires died on 18 June 2020 at the age of 83.Chivas: Fallece Arturo Chaires, miembro del Campeon√≠simo ==References== Category:1937 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Mexican footballers
title: Arturo Chaires
